rows.label: tlk70000038_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Seeing dark-dark monsters destroying
everything made Popolo super sad.
Shopping ward like Popolo's home...

rows.label: tlk70000038_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Then everyone in shopping
ward rallied to help.

rows.label: tlk70000038_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Now place almost back to normal!
Popolo getting back to old self too!

rows.label: tlk70000038_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Trouble cause fur all over body to
shed. Boss bald before too long!

rows.label: tlk70000038_02_msg0006
rows.name:
Might quite like to
see Boss like that...

rows.label: tlk70000038_02_msg0009
rows.name:
Next time Popolo's turn to work
hard. Must do best to protect
shopping ward...and Boss's fur!
